TopicTitle: Engine fairing shown in part preview?

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I made a new engine and export it from Unity with the PartTools. All works well but in the VAB part selection the engine is shown WITH the fairing (in the small preview image). 

If i select the engine and drag it to the building area, the fairing is not shown ... as intendet. In flight all worked well too. Only the preview is wrong. Any Idea what I'm doing wrong?

thx ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

![XuzPOYC.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/XuzPOYC.jpg)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T14:38:33Z" title="05/30/2015 02:38  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Ra1dN**

I found the answer here: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/94638)

You have to set the Tag **Icon\_Hiddden** for the fairing object.

![tYnWRqi.png](http://i.imgur.com/tYnWRqi.png)
